name: Apartheid (KomBits Game Studio)
description:
NOTE: This game does not advocate an ideology or political point of view. However, as a game about HUMANITARIAN issues, diverse politics are directly or indirectly involved. If you don’t like it, don’t play.

When discrimination reaches the State sphere and creates legal separations between ethnicities, religions or skin color, an Apartheid Regime is reached. Many injustices happen and the most you can do is delay them.

The most famous case of state apartheid was in South Africa between 1948 and 1994.

THE GAME: APARTHEID is a narrative game inspired in real facts. Try to Defend your home from Zionist foreigners in a country mired in an apartheid regime… or just Delay the Inevitable.

FEATURES:

  • Choice matters and can change the story
  • Four possible endings
  • Language selection (english and portuguese)
  • Music and SFX volume adjustment

CONTROLS: MOUSE TO SELECT OPTIONS

CREDITS: All assets are original and made by me (Swami Abdalla-Santos) within 48 hours at LD50. Music are AI generated and customized by me.
